channel.title: Clustering on home

item.title: Rec-me-a-Dram for a Dream
item.description: There are currently around 130 operational Scotch Whisky distilleries in Scotland. Collectively, the Scotch Whisky industry produces over 1 billion bottles of Scotch per year, with an export market valued at around Â£4b. Interest in whisky has been steadily growing for some time, with particular interest in single malt whiskies. Believe it or not, each and every one of the 130 distilleries produces a whisky with a unique flavour profile. For any beginner at the start of their journey into Scotch, the shear breadth of choice can be confusing and daunting, potentially resulting in choice paralysis.
